abilities.name: Durable Blade
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack, put it into your hand instead of the discard pile. (Discard all cards attached to it.)

attacks.name: Trash Slash
attacks.effect: This attack does 10 damage for each Item card in your discard pile. You can't do more than 130 damage in this way.
